name: fravegaautomation
description: Automatizaciones de test en la pagina web de Fravega
author: Nicolas Pavon

scripts.cy:run:all: npm run allure:cleanResults && (cypress run --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/**/*.js --env allure=true || true) && npm run allure:results && npm run allure:open

scripts.cy:run:compare: npm run allure:cleanResults && (cypress run --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/compare/*.js --env allure=true || true) && npm run allure:results && npm run allure:open
scripts.cy:run:location: npm run allure:cleanResults && (cypress run --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/location/*.js --env allure=true || true) && npm run allure:results && npm run allure:open
scripts.cy:run:search: npm run allure:cleanResults && (cypress run --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/search/*.js --env allure=true || true) && npm run allure:results && npm run allure:open
